Given your interest in war-themed films and the actor Humphrey Bogart, I'd highly recommend watching "Casablanca" (1942). It's a classic film noir about a cynical expatriate American cafe owner who struggles with his past as he navigates political intrigue in Morocco during World War II. Plus, it stars Humphrey Bogart!

If you're looking for something more recent, "Valkyrie" (2008) is another fascinating film that dramatizes a real-life assassination plot against Adolf Hitler during World War II. Tom Cruise and an impressive ensemble cast bring this gripping story to life. Enjoy the movies!
